overview: To some, it's simply a hobby, a pastime if you will, but to others performance boating is much more then that, it's a lifestyle! "Pegged 2 The Movie" is an adrenalin charged documentary featuring high speed poker runners, wild and crazy V-drives, bad blown jets, plus bikini clad beauties and the good times the make performance boating a way of life. Onboard cameras let you experience the thrills of riding along in high speed water born rockets, exclusive aerial angles provide a spectacular view of the action, scenic landscapes and the dramatic beauty that is performance boating. Sit back and enjoy the ride, as the creatures of Pegged bring you hair-raising sounds of radical blown V8 engines, a killer sound track and those hot summer days on the water right into your living room with "Pegged 2 The Movie".
title: Pegged 2
